treatment.description: Plants (3–)4–10 × 5–15 dm. Aerial flowering stems glabrous. Leaves: blade lanceolate to narrowly elliptic, 2.5–3.5(–4) × (0.4–)0.5–0.8(–1.2) cm, margins plane. Inflorescence branches glabrous. Perianths white. 2n = 40.
treatment.habitat: white or red wind-blown sands on flats
treatment.discussion: Variety papiliunculi occurs from Emery, Garfield, Kane, and San Juan counties, Utah, southward to Apache, Coconino, and Navajo counties, Arizona, and just enters San Juan County, New Mexico.
